original_text:
Great Rhino
La Pragmatic Play ci ha abituati da tempo a non aspettarci giochi particolarmente complicati, dal gameplay complesso, allo stesso modo ha sempre proposto nel suo catalogo prodotti di alta qualità con cui passare delle piacevoli sessioni di gioco!
Great Rhino non si allontana dalla filosofia della casa madre: è una slot machine semplice ma al contempo accattivante e divertente e che proprio in virtù del suo essere intuitiva e facile da giocare, è adatta anche a coloro che provano le slot machine per le prime volte. Inoltre, la puntata massima è di 100 € e questo rende Great Rhino un gioco soddisfacente anche per i giocatori più navigati e che amano il rischio.
Il tema è quello dei safari: ci troviamo nella savana africana, con una grafica dai toni caldi e avvolgenti in cui gli animali sono riprodotti in maniera molto realistica. Il grande rinoceronte è il protagonista della slot e insieme a lui troviamo gli altri animali caratteristici dei paesaggi africani.
Per quanto riguarda le possibilità di vincita, Great Rhino presenta una volatilità media, il che significa che le vincite non sono frequentissime ma nemmeno rare e che l’ammontare dei premi può raggiungere cifre discrete. Il Return to Player invece è un canonico 96,53%, in linea con la scelta della Pragmatic Play di avere un RTP intorno al 96% per tutte le sue slot.
Simboli, Wild e Scatter
Come accade in quasi tutte le slot machine di questo sviluppatore, anche in Great Rhino i simboli sono tematici e non. Tra quelli non tematici troviamo, al solito, i numeri e le lettere corrispondenti alle carte da gioco, in questo caso dal J all’Asso. Per quanto riguarda i simboli tematici invece, trovandoci nella savana africana, non potevano non riguardare gli animali che la popolano: abbiamo quindi, oltre al rinoceronte, anche la lince, il fenicottero, una iena e un coccodrillo, il cui valore può essere conosciuto prima dell’inizio del gioco, consultando la tabella dei pagamenti a cui si accede tramite il tasto i.
Il Wild non poteva non essere il grande rinoceronte, che in questo caso non ha solamente la funzione di jolly, ma quando ricopre l’intero schema di gioco, durante i free spins, permette di vincere uno dei due jackpot in palio.
Lo Scatter è invece rappresentato da un albero e regala 10 giri gratuiti quando compare sui rulli per almeno tre volte.
I due jackpot di Great Rhino
I due jackpot in palio su Great Rhino si possono vincere quando il gioco è in modalità free spins: il rinoceronte assumerà la funzione di Wild impilato e resterà fisso sui rulli; se alla fine del gioco sullo schermo ci saranno 14 rinoceronti si vincerà un premio pari a 375 volte la puntata, mentre se i simboli Wild saranno 15, il jackpot sarà quello massimo e varrà 500 volte la puntata.

raw_translation.response:
Great Rhino
Pragmatic Play has long been known for its high-quality catalog of slot games that offer enjoyable gaming sessions without overly complex gameplay. Great Rhino is no exception, offering an intuitive and easy-to-play experience that is both eye-catching and entertaining. This simplicity makes it accessible to first-time players, while its maximum bet of €100 makes it satisfying for experienced, risk-loving gamblers as well.

The game takes place in the African savannah, with warm and immersive graphics that realistically reproduce the animals that inhabit this landscape. The rhinoceros is the star of the slot, but other typical African animals also make an appearance. As for winning possibilities, Great Rhino has medium volatility, meaning wins are neither too frequent nor too rare, and prize amounts can reach significant sums. The Return to Player rate is a standard 96.53%, consistent with the Pragmatic Play's aim for an RTP of around 96% for all its slots.

As usual for this developer, the symbols in Great Rhino are both thematic and non-thematic. Non-thematic symbols include the usual numerical and alphabetical cards from J to Ace. Thematic symbols depict the animals of the African savannah, such as the lynx, flamingos, hyenas, and crocodiles. These symbols' values can be accessed in the paytable by pressing the "i" button before the game begins.

The Wild symbol is the rhinoceros itself, which acts as a standard substitute symbol in addition to triggering two jackpots during free spins if the rhinoceros completely fills the game screen. The Scatter symbol, a tree, triggers 10 free spins when landing on the reels at least three times. During free spins, the rhinoceros becomes a stacked wild that remains fixed in place. If there are 14 rhinoceros symbols at the end of the game, a prize of 375 times the bet is awarded. If there are 15 Wild symbols, the maximum jackpot of 500 times the bet is won.

Overall, Great Rhino is a simple yet engaging game that offers a chance to win significant rewards for both novice and experienced players who enjoy a bit of risk.

Great Rhino is no exception, offering an intuitive and easy-to-play experience that is both eye-catching and entertaining. This simplicity makes it accessible to first-time players, while its maximum bet of €100 makes it satisfying for experienced, risk-loving gamblers as well.

The game takes place in the African savannah, with warm and immersive graphics that realistically reproduce the animals that inhabit this landscape. The rhinoceros is the star of the slot, but other typical African animals also make an appearance. As for winning possibilities, Great Rhino has medium volatility, meaning wins are neither too frequent nor too rare, and prize amounts can reach significant sums. The Return to Player rate is a standard 96.53%, consistent with the Pragmatic Play's aim for an RTP of around 96% for all its slots.

As usual for this developer, the symbols in Great Rhino are both thematic and non-thematic. Non-thematic symbols include the usual numerical and alphabetical cards from J to Ace. Thematic symbols depict the animals of the African savannah, such as the lynx, flamingos, hyenas, and crocodiles. These symbols' values can be accessed in the paytable by pressing the "i" button before the game begins.

Overall, Great Rhino is a simple yet engaging game that offers a chance to win significant rewards for both novice and experienced players who enjoy a bit of risk.

raw_translation.response:
Great Rhino
Pragmatic Play has been providing us with top-quality products for a long time, never failing to deliver simple yet captivating and entertaining games to enjoy. Great Rhino is no exception. With its user-friendly interface and easy-to-understand gameplay, Great Rhino is suitable for both novice and seasoned players. The maximum bet is €100, making it a satisfying game for risk lovers.
The theme of the game is safari, set in the African savannah with realistic depictions of animals surrounded by warm and inviting graphics. The star of the slot machine is the Great Rhino, accompanied by other characteristic animals of African landscapes.
Great Rhino has medium volatility, meaning wins are not too frequent nor too rare, but the prize amounts can reach impressive figures. The Return to Player (RTP) is a classic 96.53%, in line with Pragmatic Play's choice of having an RTP around 96% for all its slots.
Symbols, Wilds, and Scatters
As with almost all slot machines from this developer, the symbols in Great Rhino are both thematic and non-thematic. Non-thematic symbols include the J through Ace, while thematic symbols are African animals such as the lynx, flamingo, hyena, and crocodile, with their respective values listed on the paytable accessed by the "i" button.
The Wild symbol, of course, is the Great Rhino, not only acting as a joker but also allowing players to win one of two jackpots during free spins when it covers the entire game board.
The Scatter symbol is represented by a tree and awards 10 free spins when it appears on the reels at least three times.
Great Rhino's Two Jackpots
Both jackpots of Great Rhino can be won during free spins mode. The Great Rhino symbol becomes a stacked Wild, remaining fixed on the reels. If players get 14 of them at the end of the game, they win a prize of 375 times the bet. And if they get 15, the jackpot is 500 times the bet.

As usual for this developer, the symbols in Great Rhino are both thematic and non-thematic. Non-thematic symbols include the usual numerical and alphabetical cards from J to Ace. Thematic symbols depict the animals of the African savannah, such as the lynx, flamingos, hyenas, and crocodiles. These symbols' values can be accessed in the paytable by pressing the "i" button before the game begins.

The Wild symbol is the rhinoceros itself, which acts as a standard substitute symbol in addition to triggering two jackpots during free spins if the rhinoceros completely fills the game screen. The Scatter symbol, a tree, triggers 10 free spins when landing on the reels at least three times. During free spins, the rhinoceros becomes a stacked wild that remains fixed in place. If there are 14 rhinoceros symbols at the end of the game, a prize of 375 times the bet is awarded. If there are 15 Wild symbols, the maximum jackpot of 500 times the bet is won.

Overall, Great Rhino is a simple yet engaging game that offers a chance to win significant rewards for both novice and experienced players who enjoy a bit of risk.

response.headline: Volatility and RTP
response.content:
Great Rhino, huh? Well, let me tell you, this game is no amateur when it comes to volatility and Return to Player (RTP). If you're not familiar with these terms, it's pretty simple. Volatility is the level of risk involved in a game, in terms of the frequency and amount of payouts, while RTP refers to the percentage you can expect to win back from your bets.

In terms of volatility, Great Rhino falls into the medium category - which means that you'll experience a well-balanced mix of wins and losses. Of course, you can always adjust your betting strategy depending on your personal preferences: high rollers can go for the max bet and aim for bigger wins, while more cautious players can stick to low bets and enjoy more prolonged gameplay.

The real magic of Great Rhino lies in its RTP rate of 96.53%. This is right on the money (literally) with Pragmatic Play's usual aim for around 96% RTP for all of their slots. This means that players can expect a decent payout in the long run, regardless of their betting style.

So, if you're feeling lucky, and have your sights set on some big wins, Great Rhino is definitely worth a spin - or a few hundred.

So put on your safari hat and pack your binoculars, because it's time to go exploring the African savannah. Encounter lions, elephants, flamingos, hyenas and more as you make your way to those jackpot wins. With Great Rhino, there's never a boring moment.

The Scatter symbol is a tree that triggers 10 free spins when landing on the reels at least three times. During free spins, the rhinoceros becomes a stacked wild that remains fixed in place.

Graphics and Theme

Great Rhino takes place in the African savannah and has warm and immersive graphics that realistically depict the animals that inhabit this landscape. The rhinoceros is the star of the game, but other typical African animals also make an appearance. Thematic symbols depict animals such as the lynx, flamingos, hyenas, and crocodiles. The graphics and theme work together to create an eye-catching and entertaining gaming experience.

Jackpot Opportunities

Great Rhino features two jackpots triggered by the Wild symbol during free spins if the rhinoceros completely fills the game screen. If there are 14 Wild symbols at the end of the game, a prize of 375 times the bet is awarded. If there are 15 Wild symbols, the maximum jackpot of 500 times the bet is won. These jackpots offer significant opportunities for players to win big rewards.

RTP Rate and Maximum Bet

The Return to Player rate for Great Rhino is a standard 96.53%, consistent with Pragmatic Play's aim for an RTP of around 96% for all its slots. The maximum bet for the game is €100, offering a satisfying option for experienced, risk-loving gamblers.

Suitability for Players

Great Rhino by Pragmatic Play is a simple yet engaging game that offers a chance to win significant rewards for both novice and experienced players who enjoy a bit of risk. The game's medium volatility offers a good balance between winning frequency and prize amount. The intuitive and easy-to-play gameplay make it accessible to first-time players, while its €100 maximum bet makes it satisfying for experienced, risk-loving gamblers as well.
